meanings.sent1: Many people dream of visiting the beautiful southlands.
meanings.sent2: The explorer traveled to the southlands to discover new cultures.
meanings.sent3: The southlands were so warm that even the snowmen melted!
meanings.sent4: Her heart longed for the southlands, where the sun always shines.
meanings.sent5: The southlands were a paradise of palm trees and sandy beaches.

meanings.definition: The lands located to the south.
meanings.sent1: The southlands were known for their fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in the southlands grew crops all year round.
meanings.sent3: The southlands whispered secrets to the winds that blew from the north.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts always drifted to the southlands, where his ancestors once roamed.
meanings.sent5: The southlands stretched out like a vast green carpet under the blue sky.
